newsitem.title: USA: AMBAC qualifies 14 issues for bond insurance.
newsitem.headline: AMBAC qualifies 14 issues for bond insurance.

text.p: AMBAC Indemnity Corp said it has qualified for bond insurance the following 14 municipal issues scheduled for competitive sale today.
--Atkins S.D. No. 18, Ark., $3.040 million refunding bonds.
--Warren Building Authority, Mich., $10.99 million revenue bonds.
--Vance County, N.C., $6.745 million school building refunding GOs.
--Ogdensburg City S.D., N.Y., $1.3 million school district, $620,000 pension system and $4.99 million school district bonds.
--Richland County S.D. No. 2, S.C., $19.7 million GOs.
--California Area School District, Pa., $5.070 million and $3.6 million bonds.
